Major_Arcs.title: Introduction and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting, main characters, and initial conflicts, revolving around romantic desires, contrasting viewpoints, and the impending demolition of Ghost Town.

sub_scenes.title: Setting the Stage in Ghost Town
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the comic's title, setting, and initial character dynamics within the saloon and Ghost Town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Girl from Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Ghost Town's Fate Revealed
sub_scenes.description: Transition from saloon conversation to the revelation of Ghost Town's impending demolition and the emotional fallout.

narrative_arcs.title: Saloon Exit and Ghost Town Ride
Ghost Town's Past and Airport Future

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Turmoil and Flashback
sub_scenes.description: Deepening emotional conflict regarding Ghost Town's destruction, contrasted with a flashback to its vibrant past.

narrative_arcs.title: Emotional Argument about Ghost Town's Demolition

Major_Arcs.title: Family and Business Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to family dynamics and business tensions surrounding the airport project, focusing on Nan's conflicts with her father and her relationship with Cal.

sub_scenes.title: Airport Business and Family Discord
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of business discussions about the airport and the emergence of family tensions, particularly between Nan and her father.

sub_scenes.title: Maternal Advice and Nan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Nan seeks comfort and advice from her mother and maid, leading to her decision to confront Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Maid's Pragmatic View on Love and Action

sub_scenes.title: Horseback Confrontation and Reconciliation
sub_scenes.description: Nan confronts Cal on horseback, leading to a tense conversation about commitment and ultimately a hesitant reconciliation.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Reconciliation and Understanding

Major_Arcs.title: The Snowstorm Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: A major arc focused on the sudden and severe snowstorm and its impact on the community, testing relationships and survival instincts.

sub_scenes.title: Weather Assessment and Livestock Threat
sub_scenes.description: Initial assessment of the unprecedented snowstorm and growing concerns for livestock survival.

narrative_arcs.title: Mr. Wills and Son Assess the Snowstorm's Severity
Grave Concerns about Livestock and Fodder
Confirmation of the Weather's Unprecedented Danger

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Solace and Facing Despair
sub_scenes.description: Moments of seeking comfort and hope amidst the overwhelming despair caused by the relentless snowstorm.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Comfort and Hope Amidst Hardship
Cal's Ominous Reflection on Impending Starvation and Future Uncertainty
Nan's Doubt and Cal's Reassurance in the Face of Crisis
Nan's Mother's Plea for Rest and Hope Amidst Overwhelming Odds
Cal's Restless Night and the Unrelenting Snow
Despair and Weariness in the Face of Endless Winter

sub_scenes.title: Salvation from the Sky and Romantic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Unexpected aerial aid arrives, bringing relief and leading to a moment of romantic connection amidst the crisis.

narrative_arcs.title: Sound of an Airplane and a Glimmer of Hope
Excitement and Realization of Fodder Drop
Conversation on Romance Amidst Crisis and Relief

Major_Arcs.title: Cowtown Casanova and Jeff's Dilemma
Major_Arcs.description: Shifting narrative focus to a new location and characters, introducing Chane Benson and the unfolding drama around Jeff and his mother's concerns.

sub_scenes.title: Introducing Chane Benson
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Chane Benson in a classic Western town setting, showcasing his fighting prowess and sparking varied reactions from townspeople.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and a Town Scene
Reactions and Judgments of Bystanders on Chane Benson's Actions
Further Reactions and Cynical Commentary on Chane Benson

sub_scenes.title: Mother's Worries and Jeff's Gun Handling
sub_scenes.description: Focus shifts to Jeff and his mother, highlighting her concerns about his fascination with violence and contrasting moral figures.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother's Flashback and Concerns About Jeff
Macho Banter and Violent Undertones between Clyde and Chane

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Intervention and Clyde's Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: Sally's growing worry about Jeff leads her to seek help, while Clyde attempts to downplay the situation and focus on their relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Affectionate Agreement and Future Vision
Narrator's Observation of Jeff's Absence and Town Ride
Sally Seeks Advice from Mr. Benson
Mr. Benson's Advice on Violence and Youth

Major_Arcs.title: The Juniper Article and its Repercussions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around a controversial newspaper article in Juniper and its impact on relationships and actions of characters, especially Sally, Clyde, and Benson.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Outrage and Clyde's Dismissal
sub_scenes.description: Sally reacts with fury to a newspaper article, confronting both Benson and Clyde, the editor, about its damaging content.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Outrage Over the Article and Initial Talk with Benson
Sally Confronts Clyde, the Editor, About the Article
Clyde's Dismissive Reaction and Sally's Criticism
Sally Seeks Benson's Guidance in Juniper

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Plan and Jeff's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Benson outlines his plan to use the press for truth, while Jeff reads the article and speculates on Clyde's violent response.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Reaction to the Article and Speculation on Clyde's Response
Considering Dinner with Chane and Reflecting on His Character

sub_scenes.title: Dinner with Chane and Rising Conflict
sub_scenes.description: Dinner with Chane Benson leads to escalating tensions, misunderstandings, and physical confrontations among Sally, Jeff, and Chane.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Dinner Moonlight Conversation and Rising Tension
Immediate Aftermath and Explanations Following the Forced Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Race to Save Clyde and Town Showdown
sub_scenes.description: Realizing Chane's violent intentions, Sally and Jeff rush to town to intervene, leading to a showdown.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Danger to Clyde and Urgent Need to Go to Town
Jeff's Determined Ride to Save Clyde
Confrontation in Town and Jeff's Intervention
Escalating Tensions and a Challenge to a Fistfight
Anxious Wait in the Clarion Office
Recounting the Night's Events and Newspaper Priority
Praise for Jeff and Clyde's Character and Family Values

Major_Arcs.title: New Boss and Ranch Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: A new major arc introducing Steve Daley as the new boss and setting up ranch-related conflicts, including range wars and personal tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Introducing Steve Daley and Initial Ranch Tensions
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Steve Daley as the new boss, immediately met with aggressive confrontation and underlying ranch troubles.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the New Boss, Steve Daley

sub_scenes.title: Doubts, Ranch Troubles, and Town Trip
sub_scenes.description: Hank's doubts about Steve, revelation of ranch problems hinting at a range war, and preparation for a trip to town.

narrative_arcs.title: Settling Steve In and Past Doubts
Ranch Troubles and Range War Fear
Trip to Town and Hank's Orders for Dress Material

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Steve's Defense
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve in town encounter Fred Bridges, leading to a tense confrontation and Steve's defense of Betsy.

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy's Romantic Awakening and Ranch Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Betsy's evolving romantic feelings for Steve alongside escalating ranch-related tensions and conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Hank's Reprieve and Romantic Realization
sub_scenes.description: Betsy reconsiders firing Hank and realizes her romantic feelings for Steve.

sub_scenes.title: Job Offer and Love Confession
sub_scenes.description: Betsy offers Steve the job but expresses concern about his guns, leading to a surprising and sudden confession of love between them.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Conflict and Past Ambush Revealed
sub_scenes.description: Old Man Bridges complains to Betsy, and Hank confronts Steve, leading to the revelation of a past ambush and justification for Steve's actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Hank and Steve's Defense
Justification for Arms and Recall of Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Turn to Violence and Steve's Departure
sub_scenes.description: Betsy decides to take a more forceful approach, arming herself, leading to a conflict with Steve and his resolute departure.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Narration of Pursuit and Arrival at Devil's Pass

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Romantic Interlude
sub_scenes.description: Arrival at Devil's Pass leads to a dangerous confrontation, followed by a surprising romantic embrace between Betsy and Steve.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Capture at Devil's Pass

Major_Arcs.title: Shifting Relationships and Business Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores complex relationships and business betrayals, focusing on Carrie, Fred, and Dave, revealing manipulations and shifting affections.

sub_scenes.title: Dave and Betsy's Conflict and Ranch Concerns
sub_scenes.description: Betsy sternly confronts Dave, while another narrative thread introduces ranch concerns and Curley's suspicious behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Curley's Troubled Behavior and Ranch Concerns

sub_scenes.title: Fence Dispute and Violent Escalation
sub_scenes.description: A fence dispute escalates into a violent confrontation, revealing Curley's aggression and setting a dangerous tone.

sub_scenes.title: Carrie and Dave's Reconciliation and Fred's Ambition
sub_scenes.description: Carrie and Dave reconcile, while Fred Gordon's ambitions and marriage proposal to Carrie are revealed.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion of Fred and Differing Opinions
Agreement to Avoid Conflict and Carrie's Reflection
Encounter with Fred Gordon and Ominous Question
Miss Bronson and Mr. Gordon's Conversation about Dave's Feelings

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Confrontation over Contract
sub_scenes.description: Fred's manipulative plan regarding the Carlton contract is revealed, leading to Carrie's furious confrontation and rejection.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Assertions in Carlton's Office
Reflecting on Past Pride and Present Hurt with Fred
Unexpected Encounter and Cold Dismissal in Town
Concern and Defiance in the Buckboard

sub_scenes.title: Truth Revealed and Romantic Reunion
sub_scenes.description: Dave reveals the truth about the contract, leading to Carrie's emotional realization and a romantic reunion with Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Father and Dave's Clarification & Carlton's Interjection
Dave's Confession and Carrie's Ride to Fred

Major_Arcs.title: Chris, Dirk, and Rance: A Love Triangle and Escape
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new set of characters - Chris, Dirk, and Rance - focusing on their entangled relationships, Dirk's injury and escape, and the resulting conflicts and romantic resolutions.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Arrival and Injury
sub_scenes.description: Dirk arrives injured seeking help from Chris, revealing he has been shot.

narrative_arcs.title: Late Night Visitor and Urgent Plea

sub_scenes.title: Family Concern and Marshal's Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: Dirk's family expresses concern, while the Marshal arrives at Chris's ranch, initiating an inquiry.

narrative_arcs.title: Worried Kin and a Father's Decision

sub_scenes.title: Marshal's Demand and Chris's Plea
sub_scenes.description: The Marshal confronts Chris and Dirk, demanding Dirk's arrest, leading to Chris's plea for mercy and a shift in the Marshal's plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Mercy and a Change of Plans

sub_scenes.title: Love Confession and Escape Plan
sub_scenes.description: Chris and Rance confess their feelings, but duty and Dirk's situation complicate their romance, leading to a plan for Dirk's escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Duty vs. Love and a Hint of Escape
Decision to Act and Arming Dirk

sub_scenes.title: Failed Escape, Gunfight, and Moral Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: Dirk's escape attempt fails, leading to a gunfight with the Marshal and a moral crisis regarding Rance's fate.

sub_scenes.title: Recovery, Deception Unveiled, and Proposal
sub_scenes.description: Rance recovers, Chris reveals her return and care, and Rance's deception is unveiled, leading to a marriage proposal.

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Preparations and Dirk's Shadow
sub_scenes.description: Pre-wedding reflections and preparations are overshadowed by the looming threat of Dirk's potential return, culminating in the wedding ceremony's dramatic interruption.
